TABLE.NAME: rocketchat
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the rocketchat activity module instances. This table is the default table required for modules. Will contains all the instance parameters necessary to pass to rocketchat

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name for moodle instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: displaytype
FIELD.COMMENT: display type

FIELD.NAME: popupheight
FIELD.COMMENT: popup height

FIELD.NAME: popupwidth
FIELD.COMMENT: popup width

FIELD.NAME: embbeded
FIELD.COMMENT: embbeded mode for Rocket.Chat web client

FIELD.NAME: moderatorroles
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle roles in course that will be Rocket.Chat moderators.

FIELD.NAME: userroles
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle roles in course that will be Rocket.Chat user (with normal rights).

FIELD.NAME: retentionenabled
FIELD.COMMENT: override global message rentention time

FIELD.NAME: overrideglobal
FIELD.COMMENT: override global message rentention time

FIELD.NAME: maxage
FIELD.COMMENT: maxAge value for retention policy overriding

FIELD.NAME: filesonly
FIELD.COMMENT: remove only files while deleting messages (rentention policy)

FIELD.NAME: excludepinned
FIELD.COMMENT: exclude pinned messages while deleting messages (rentention policy)

TABLE.NAME: rocketchatxrecyclebin
TABLE.COMMENT: joining table use to delete remote Rocket.Chat private groups

FIELD.NAME: binid
FIELD.COMMENT: recycletool_course id

FIELD.NAME: cmid
FIELD.COMMENT: old cmid while put into recyclebin

FIELD.NAME: rocketchatid
FIELD.COMMENT: remote Rocket.Chat id
